page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED.
page.content: When Mum,Jo and I woke up we went downstairs to have a quick breakfast. {Meanwhile Dad was lazily sleeping.}We went to Yeovil to get some shopping from Tesco's.We drove to Yeovil in Mum's car and parked in Tesco's car park and walked to the town centre. {Meanwhile Dad had just got up and {started eating his breakfast.}When we had got to the centre we went into W.H.Smiths.We walked straight up to the pens and got me a sty-pen.We went up to Denners and had a look at the clothes and shoes.{Meanwhile Dad was {watching cricket on T.V.}Then we went to Tesco's to do the shopping it was very busy. {At home we found my Dad still {watching cricket.}I sat down with him we watched "Planet of the Apes"Then when it was finished we watched Live Aid.
